comments.body: The new namespace handling functionality is in AbstractSession class and I just committed the missing new TCK test cases. Resolving as Fixed.

description:
JSR 283 makes namespace handling more flexible and user-friendly (less exceptions, no unexpected mapping changes during a session, etc.). The changes are mostly compliant with JSR 170, so we can implement them already for Jackrabbit 1.x.
